trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Murrieta
There were no other sightings in Murrieta on or around July 5th 2009
Summary: Oval or cigar shape about 200 ft in length, red lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife & I were enjoying our hot tub when I spotted an object heading West about 2,500 AGL making no sound. What make it stand out was it had no white collision light, just a red one. In looking further we spotted a much dimmer red light at the front of the craft. We could barely see the outline but it looked oval or cigar-shaped. Straight and level flight a little slower than the jets which fly over. We are located near an airway so it's easy to distinguish real airplanes from what we saw last night.
